look for something like:

setSidebar(ID, -1);

or:
setSidebarInterface(ID, -1);

I think backpack is 3, 4, or 5
[/quote]
Where are those located at?[/quote]
I can’t exactly say, could be PlayerAssistant, Player, Client, or more…

Nope, it’s before the login, the sidebar is disabled.

item.title: There is no backpack
item.dc:creator: @saciid.1 saciid.1
item.description:
@saciid.1 wrote:

I can’t click on the backpack to open it up when I leave the first door of tutorial island, that lady that gives you a tinderbox / axe at the pond:

I pressume this is where the problem is:

public PacketSender viewing() { sendFrame126("@blu@Viewing the items that you were given.", 12803); sendFrame126("Click on the backpack icon to the right side of the", 12804); sendFrame126("main window to view your inventory. Your inventory is a list of", 12805); sendFrame126("everything you have in your backpack.", 12806); sendFrame218(12802); return this; }

Read full topic
